Description: How is everybody today? We're okay, thanks for wondering. This is a spiffy pair of Ray-Ban Justin Sunglasses Number RB 4165. Made in Italy 622/55 54016 145 3N Frame material: Nylon Frame color: Black Lenses: Blue Mirror Pre-owned in fine condition. Minor blemishes on the lenses are visible if examined closely but not visible (to us) when the glasses are worn. Arms are nice and tight with secure hinges. Ray-Ban Justin sunglasses may just be one of the coolest looks in the Ray-Ban collection. Inspired by the iconic Wayfarer sunglasses, this style has been redesigned with slightly larger rectangle lenses, fresh new frame colors, stunning colored lenses and a rubberized frame finish to really give it that extra edge. Justin RB4165 sunglasses are bold, fun and unforgettable. These sunglasses come in traditional frame colors, as well as some total statement-making colors such as red, violet, blue, fuchsia, turquoise and matte blue. Add some edge to your style with these durable and unmistakable, iconic sunglasses. Please examine the photos carefully. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us before placing a bid. Buyer receives only what has been described or shown in the photos. Please remit payment within 2 days unless alternate arrangements are made in advance. Thank you for your interest and good luck!
